characterDescription:
Hanavanar was King of Jah Keved. Though he was not a Shardbearer, some rumors indicated that he secretly kept a Shardblade.
King Hanavanar was killed by Szeth at King Taravangian's bidding (who held Szeth's Oathstone at the time) in order to cause political instability.

characterDetails.Appearance: Hanavanar was a lighteyed man, thick of waist and shoulder. He had a square brown beard and a prominent nose.
